title: pH modulates efficiency of singlet oxygen production by flavin cofactors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28783-28790
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05540C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Andrej Hovan, Dagmar Sedláková, One-Sun Lee, Gregor Bánó, Erik Sedlák
An extra adenine mononucleotide part in flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD), compared with flavin mononucleotide (FMN), significantly affects FAD's conformational properties and efficiency of singlet oxygen production in dependence on pH.
